text: Confederation of Government Employees Association Delhi (CGEAD) is a government employees union recognized by Delhi government that represents employees serving under various departments of Delhi government. == History == CGEAD was established in the 1990s as a trades union and was recognized by Delhi government in 2018. == Office bearers == Ajay Veer Yadav serves as the General Secretary of Confederation of Government Employees Association Delhi (CGEAD). == References == Category:Delhi Category:1990s establishments in India Category:Trade unions
title: Confederation of Government Employees Association Delhi
